What can you deal with?

1) Holding your #doge and watching it keep going down

2) Selling your #dogecoin and watching it keep going up.

If you invest only what you can afford to lose then answer should be #1.

If dogecoin hits .75 again im buying a tesla
@DocawesomeSmith @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Not if he doesn't sell 😂
@cohobeatz @InwVegetable @ProTheDoge @dogecoin 4 hours*
@cohobeatz @InwVegetable @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Ooooo back to $0.29, I guess that tweet didn't age well in.. 3 hours? 🤣 😂 😂

@cohobeatz @609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin However none of you Dogeheads are answering the question I've been asking for the past 5 hours. What are the fundamentals and tech of $DOGE for it to be a long term hold instead of a joke? To me everyone is on a Doge hype train that has no legs to stand on.

@cohobeatz @609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin 1/ I said it before and I'll say it again. I like Doge for what it is.. a joke. It was made as a joke. It's fundamentals are a joke. It was made to make fun of crypto and the whole point was to buy it for the lulz and say "I'll give you a couple of doge for ___"
@theAdawg1012 @ProTheDoge @dogecoin What. Are. Doge's. Fundamentals? I've been arguing with 5 of you dogeheads for the last hour and none of you can tell me what makes doge a good LONG hodl?
@ThomasSaldana @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Oh man you got me 🤣🤣

@609_ThaRealTony @Andreww_uwu @ProTheDoge @dogecoin @SamuelLJackson I've been having Doge as the joke that I bought it for. To be able to say "I've got thousand's of Doge for you". Cause that's what it was made for! I like Doge for its joke purpose. INVESTING in it though is absolutely moronic.
@theAdawg1012 @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Quit bitching if you can't answer simple questions about the coin that YOU invested in and are hodling LONG.

@Andreww_uwu @609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Lots of talk for someone that can't give me a coins fundamentals. What makes their tech so good? Is being backed by celebrities a fundamental now? Oh man let me go pay @SamuelLJackson to shout-out ADA so that it'll please you #dogehodlers
@theAdawg1012 @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Imagine not cashing out over 3 mil on a joke coin cause "short term tax"
@onyxXcrypto @609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin @elonmusk @VitalikButerin You're dodging my question.

@InwVegetable @ProTheDoge @dogecoin He was up over 3 mil. Tax on short term capital gains is ~40%. He would have  ~$1.8 mil after tax at that price. Tax on long term gains is around ~15%. He is at ~1.2 mil. IF he hold and IF this price holds after tax he has ~1 mil. @ProTheDoge  losing 0.8mil and I'm the clown.
@jonyoungtkd @ProTheDoge @dogecoin That would've been a great investment... IF HE SOLD.

@onyxXcrypto @609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin What. Are. It's. Fundamentals? 
That's what I'm asking. As of right now what makes DOGE a good investment long term besides the one off @elonmusk tweet the pumps it.

@609_ThaRealTony @ProTheDoge @dogecoin Long term?! On DOGE?!? Are you joking right now? Tell me Doge's fundamentals. Is it eco-friendly and based around that like ADA? Is it user friendly and does it have the tiniest of user fee's like XLM? Is it capped like BTC? Or is it just one, big JOKE?
@ProTheDoge @dogecoin After being down $2.1 mil brother just sell this is the worst investment of your life. You're investing in a meme that has no substance and it was created for the lulz.

The #DogeFoundation is a more important development than if #Tesla announced they were accepting #dogecoin tomorrow. 

Much more important.
